original_text: You have that new life because you belong to Christ. One day, Christ will show himself clearly to everyone. Then everyone will see that you are with him. They will see that you also are great, like he is.
korean_text: 우리 생명이신 그리스도께서 나타나실 그 때에 너희도 그와 함께 영광 중에 나타나리라

sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그 새 생명을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: One day, Christ will show himself clearly to everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 언젠가 그리스도는 자신을 모든 사람에게 분명히 보여주실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Then everyone will see that you are with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 모든 사람이 당신이 그와 함께 있다는 것을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will see that you also are great
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신 또한 위대하다는 것을 볼 것입니다
